title: Boris Dubrovin (mathematician)
summary: Boris Anatolievich Dubrovin (Russian: Борис Анатольевич Дубровин;  6 April 1950 – 19 March 2019[1]) was a Russian mathematician, Doctor of Physical and Mathematical Sciences (1984).[2] After his death, the Dubrovin Medal was created in his memory, and is awarded to promising researchers who make outstanding contributions to the fields of mathematical physics and geometry.[3]
